ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and denied the Day of Judgment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And rejected the Day of Judgement as a lie
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and we gave the lie to the Day of Judgement
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and rejected the Day of Judgment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And used to deny the Day of Justice.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And we used to call the day of judgment a lie;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and we cried lies to the Day of Doom,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And we used to deny the Day of Judgment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and we denied the Day of Judgement
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And we have been belying the Day of Requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and we used to deny the Day of Retribution
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And we used to deny the Day of Judgment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And we used to belie the Day of Recompense
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and belied the Day of Recompense
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And we used to deny the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:46] and we used to deny the Day of Judgement, [the Day] of Resurrection and Requital,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And we used to deny the Day of Judgement) and we used to say that the Day of Reckoning will never happen,
